name: April The Game
description:
Your world lies in ruin.  You lost everyting.  Why did any of this happen? I... I want to find out why!

April is a Game in early development. Best played with Controller.

Features in the Full Release:

  • Real-Time Combat
  • Dimension Shift
  • Engaging Storyline
  • Loot and Level System

April will be a similar experience like Seiken Densetsu (Secret of Mana), The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Hyper Light Drifter.

Try the prototype, comment but most importantly have fun :)

See ya
The April Game Team
